agent

Class FoodRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
      • agent.FoodRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    reactor.fn.Consumer<reactor.bus.Event<ParserMessageJSON>>

    @Component
public class FoodRecommender
extends Agent
    FoodRecommender: calculate scores for each dish and generate reasons for recommendation. State mapping: 0 - ask meal type 1 - ask exercise rate 2 - publish recommendation
